title: Clover Club Recipe
full_text:
Clover Club Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
gin
3/4
ounce
fresh lemon juice
(about
1/2
a
lemon
)
2
teaspoons
raspberry syrup or
grenadine
1
large
very fresh
egg white
Directions
Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake, without ice, for 10 seconds, to aerate the egg white. Open and fill with ice, then reseal and shake very hard for 10 seconds; strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Notes
Some recipes call for the addition of a 1/2 ounce or so of dry vermouth. A worthwhile experiment.
Special Equipment
Cocktail shaker, cocktail strainer
This Recipe Appears In
Cocktails and Spirits with Paul Clarke: Eggs (Whites and Yolks) in Cocktails
Gin
